article.title: Lockheed Martin ISGS Receives Contract to Support Special Operations Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation Information Systems and Global Services (ISGS) is being awarded a potential $5 billion indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract with mixed payment provisions for contractor logistics support services in support of U.S. Special Operations Command worldwide. The minimum amount guaranteed under the contract is $2.5 million.
